data_share.back_to_pending: You can not change a request back to pending.
data_share.declined_request: The user has declined access to the data.
data_share.email_error: Request created but error sending email.
data_share.existing_request: You have already requested data from this user.
data_share.farms_ownership_error: Farms do not belong to the user.
data_share.no_farms_error: User does not have any farms in the system.
data_share.not_existing_request: Request do not exist in the system or already accepted/declined.
data_share.own_request_error: User can not request its own data.
data_share.pending_change_error: You can not update a pending request. Please use the 'reply' endpoint to accept/decline request.
data_share.request_error: Request does not belong to the user.
data_share.user_not_registered: User is not registered in the system.
data_share.user_requesting_no_profile: User requesting data share does not have a profile in the system.
data_share.user_without_profile: User does not have a profile in the system.
data_share.wrong_method: The method is for accepting or declining requests.

dss.adaptation_duplicated: For model {0}, you have already saved a DSS with the following name {1}. Please change the name before continuing.
dss.dss_missing_metadata: DSS with ID '{0}' and version '{1}' do not exist on the DSS microservice.
dss.duplicated: Duplicated combination of Crop ({0}), Pest ({1}), DSS ({2}), Model ({3}) & DSS Model version ({4}) on a field.
dss.existing_combination: Field already has crop ({0}), pest ({1}), and DSS ({2}) combination.
dss.field_eppo_code: Field with ID {0} only accepts '{1}' crop EPPO code
dss.model_missing_metadata: The DSS with ID '{0}' and version '{1}', do not have any model with ID '{2}' and version '{3}' on the DSS microservice.
dss.warning_header: One or more crop, pest & DSS combinations already exist. Please check the response body for more information.
dss.warnings: Please fix the following error(s) before saving:

dss_process.dss_format_error: Message error from DSS do not follow IPM Decisions standards, so, unfortunately, we can not provide more information.
dss_process.dss_information: Error getting DSS information from microservice.
dss_process.dss_no_endpoint: Endpoint not available to run DSS.
dss_process.json_validation_error: A problem has occurred, the platform will try to re-run de DSS in {0} minutes
dss_process.not_on_the_fly: The DSS can not run 'on-the-fly', so this process cannot be completed.
dss_process.system_ready_error: Error running the DSS - System not ready.

farm.owner_error: You are not the owner of this farm, so the process can not be completed.

shared.missing_default_forecast: Database do not contain default weather forecast value.
shared.missing_default_historical: Database do not contain default weather historical value.
shared.wrong_fields: Wrong fields entered or missing 'id' field on the request.
shared.wrong_media_type: Wrong media type on the request.
shared.wrong_order_by: Wrong OrderBy entered on the request.

weather.end_of_season: This model is inactive since {0}. Please wait until the start of the new season or change the end date of the weather data parameters to keep using the model.
weather.internal_error: Weather service can't process your request. If the error persists, please contact us.
weather.missing_service: Weather service with ID '{0}' do not exist on the weather microservice.
weather.missing_weather_service: No Weather Data Sources or Weather Stations associated with the farm
weather.next_season: DSS default start date to get and use weather data is {0}. Please wait until this date or change the DSS parameters to start using earlier weather data.
weather.next_season_fixed: The model is only valid for use from {0} to {1}. Unfortunately, this is a fixed date determined by the DSS owner and can't be changed by the user.
weather.no_json_format: Weather data received in not in a JSON format.
weather.service_busy: Weather service is busy and can't process your request. The platform will try again to get the weather data in {0} minutes. If the error persists, please contact us.
weather.start_end_date_problem: The start date ({0}) is after the end date ({1}) on the weather data parameters. Please fix this before continuing.
weather.validation_error: Weather data received failed the IPM Decisions Weather validation schema. This might be because the weather data source selected does not accept weather parameters required by the DSS: {0}
